sourcesContent: import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import { useState } from 'react'; import './tracker-small.styles.css'; function TrackerSmall({ name, reps }) { const [amount, setAmount] = useState(reps); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); return ( <> Exercise {name.toUpperCase()} Amount e.target.value >= 0 && setAmount(e.target.value)} value={amount} /> Total ); } export default TrackerSmall;
